title: Ankita Bhide
subTitle: I'm a passionate Web Developer | Frontend Developer from Pune, India

aboutContent.content: I've utilized my 5 years of experience in Frontend development and web development. It always seems impossible until it's done. I strongly believe that life begins at the end of the comfort zone, hence I started hunting for challenges and am eager to explore new areas. You will never earn until you learn.

In this 5 years of experience I worked into multiple domain and technolgies. In my past work experiences, I've got the opportunity to lead the projects independantly as wll as in a team. I worked on various technologies HTML5, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, PHP, Jquery. I've also worked on CMS platform for building ecommerce applications. Currently I'm also working in Angular. I've used GIT and bitbucket for maintaining the code through repository, branching strategy.

I worked into multiple domain like Ecommerce, B2B/B2c, Automobile and media and marketing. I've design and developped interactive and unique website and application from scratch.where my role was to design n develop responsive website and application and maintain, pixcel perfect design, Agile developmetn methodolies with sprint planning and processes, Co-ordinate with client and multiple departments. HTML implementation from PSD to HTML.
I've recreate user experience slider, portfolio with a new way.
